I get an error trying to run RM_Setup_DX8.exe:

The procedure entry point_except_handler4_common could not be located in the dynamic link library msvcrt.dll.

What i need to do?  I try to download, unzip an copy to the game directory but it doesnt work

Do not download!   The procedure entry point_except_handler4_common could not be located in the dynamic link library msvcrt.dll.


For this there is no cure. ( i think)

This works perfectly! The game runs smoothly and everything is fine. Just follow the simple instructions. Slow download for lack of seeders.

SEED!

You're welcome! :)

@ everyone who gets the msvcrt.dll error:
Download the file below and run DXsetup (from the original CD and it includes the dll) or copy msvcrt.dll to the game directory.

http://www.bendspace.com/file/jfh3z9 (replace the b with s)
